item.title: Why
item.dc:creator: @Pzezima2 Pzezima2
item.description:
@Pzezima2 wrote:

In my UseItem.java I have this:

[CODE] public static void ItemonNpc(Client c, int itemId, int npcId, int slot) {
switch(itemId) {
case 7808:
if(itemId == 7808 && npcId == 500) {
c.Quest2 += 1;
}
break;
default:
if(c.playerRights == 3)
Misc.println("Player used Item id: “+itemId+” with Npc id: “+npcId+” With Slot : "+slot);
break;
}

}[/CODE]

and in my NpcHandler.java I have this:

case 500: if(c.Quest2 == 7) { npcs[i].forceChat("Ahhhh.. Fuck that hurt!"); } break;

So, I’m trying to make it when I use an Anger mace on npc 500, it will say “Fuck that hurt”, but it doesn’t work. What should I do?

Read full topic
